content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay per month for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 600 Euros per month. I am a student, so I want to keep the price as low as possible, but I am also dependable and responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Is that a fair price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and maintain a good relationship with me. However, I am afraid that 600 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich is not a fair price, given the current market conditions. I would be willing to negotiate with you, but I would need to see a higher offer in order to accept it. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that the price is high. I am open to negotiating, but I am afraid that I cannot go higher than 600 Euros per month. I would appreciate if you could give me some feedback on my offer. Is there anything else that I can do to make it more acceptable?

TIA!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I understand your constraints as a student. However, I am afraid that 600 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich is still not a fair price, given the current market conditions.

That being said, I am open to considering your offer if you are willing to provide some additional information or benefits that could make it more attractive. For example, if you are able to sign a longer lease agreement, or if you are able to provide references from previous landlords or employers, this could help to offset some of the risk associated with renting to a student.

I hope this helps, and I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
